channel.title: My Introduction- New staff member of Dr. House's new team
channel.description:
Good day,
My name is Gander. Some of you may know me. I've been involved with the private server scene for several years now. I developed some of the most popular servers in the past and have been asked to develop and manage the new client and server by Dr. House.
A mass email will be sent out when I am finished developing the server which should be in a few days(We will be launching the official website relaunch as well so stay tuned for that).
I recommend everyone try the server. You will have to re-run java on your first time loading as it is a new server.
As well, I have seen many suggestions regarding a chatbox. Though I'm not great with SMF, I've been writing a script custom for the current forums. It will be powered on Java similar to IRC and all you will need to do is click yes and run the java programmer and you will be able to chat with your fellow forum users finally!
I look forward to working with Dr. House and the new team that we will be adding. The future of Moparscape looks exciting!
moparisthebest edit: [quote="Moparisthebest"]This is the fakest post I've ever seen.[/quote] THIS IS A JOKE POST PEOPLE!!!!!!! GET WITH THE PROGRAM, READ THE WHOLE THREAD BEFORE YOU FREAK OUT!!!!!!! In case you are wondering, Gander2 is really [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=74259]casey[/url], good joke though, he got a ton of you.

ok so was this fake, eli5 pls i don’t understand the memes
[/quote]

This was just a reminder that though my activity has declined, I still control these forums and the trolls on them.[/quote]

You will never be better than Super_.

Read full topic

item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Bowser jr, post:42, topic:555315”][quote author=Gander2 link=topic=674506.msg4507892#msg4507892 date=1462242371]
The new domain will be a combination of the names. I will not reveal the name just yet as I want to leave a surprise for everyone.
[/quote]
Let me guess Runescape.com will be the new domain.[/quote][quote=“Davidi2, post:31, topic:555315”][quote author=Gander2 link=topic=674506.msg4507892#msg4507892 date=1462242371]
The new domain will be a combination of the names. I will not reveal the name just yet as I want to leave a surprise for everyone.
[/quote]Combination of R-L and moparscape?

Like the start of R-L and the end of moparscape?

Wouldn’t that be RuneScape? I like it.[/quote]

get with the program, bowser.

Read full topic

item.source: My Introduction- New staff member of Dr. House's new team

item.title: My Introduction- New staff member of Dr. House's new team
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“Gander2, post:19, topic:555315”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=674506.msg4507871#msg4507871 date=1462231675]
It makes sense now… they bought the forums to use as a front for a new server that comes with a pre-populated email database to advertise from, and thats why they were willing to spend so much money. Can’t wait to see what amazing items will be for sale on our new MoparMarket!
[/quote]

I believe I’m at liberty now to release more information about our plan. On Wednesday the current inactive staff members will be removed (Active ones will remain). Our site will be transformed into IPB Forums (hopefully) by the end of the week once our team receives their admin privileges. As some of you have heard already, we will be merging with another prominent RSPS site Rune–Locus. The RL infrastructure and guide database is paramount and contains a plethora of information on creating servers. Of course, Moparscape has the top-list and client structure built. We are combing the best of both worlds.

The new domain will be a combination of the names. I will not reveal the name just yet as I want to leave a surprise for everyone.

Our goal is to be transparent with the community. Thank you for your understanding and I know you are all as excited as our team![/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: My Introduction- New staff member of Dr. House's new team

item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

en.wikipedia.org

Project MKUltra

Project MKUltra, also called the CIA mind control program, is the code name given to a program of experiments on human subjects, at times illegal, designed and undertaken by the United States Central Intelligence Agency. Experiments on humans were intended to identify and develop drugs and procedures to be used in interrogations and torture in order to weaken the individual to force confessions through mind control. Organized through the Scientific Intelligence Division of the CIA, the project Th...

What will happen with the irc?

Unfortunately we will not be condoning the use of the current IRC. Our team feels for the safety of the site it is better to have everything under one umbrella and having non-team members running the IRC poses a risk to the site safety and development.

[/quote]

So what will happen with my badge? I worked hard for it![/quote]

This.
